# Introduction to resilient app development

- [Build resilient HTTP apps: Key development patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resilience/http-resilience.md): Learn how to build resilient HTTP apps using the Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience NuGet package.
- [Introduction to resilient app development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resilience/index.md): Learn about resiliency as it relates to .NET and how to build a resilience pipeline.
